originalTitle: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
title: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
content: The internet was shut during the general election, leaving many people without any income - or entertainment.

originalTitle: Life of veteran Ugandan opposition leader in danger, wife says
title: Life of veteran Ugandan opposition leader in danger, wife says
content: Kizza Besigye's wife has been to visit him at Luzira Prison and says he is extremely weak.

originalTitle: Nigeria police confirm mass church abductions after previous denial
title: Nigeria police confirm mass church abductions after previous denial
content: More than 160 people were reportedly taken from three churches in the northern Kaduna state.

originalTitle: ‘If you sleep, settlers will burn your house’: fear in the West Bank
title: ‘If you sleep, settlers will burn your house’: fear in the West Bank
content: The Palestinian village of Ras Ein al-Auja has held out against violent Israeli settlers - until now.

originalTitle: Hong Kong begins national security trial for organisers of Tiananmen vigils
title: Hong Kong begins national security trial for organisers of Tiananmen vigils
content: Rights groups condemn trial of three activists accused of 'inciting subversion of state power'.

originalTitle: Bangladesh’s latest election battlegrounds: TikTok, Facebook, YouTube
title: Bangladesh’s latest election battlegrounds: TikTok, Facebook, YouTube
content: On-the-ground campaigning kicks off on Thursday, but parties have been locked in online battles for month.

originalTitle: Trump says 'framework of a future deal' discussed on Greenland as he backs off tariffs threat
title: Trump says 'framework of a future deal' discussed on Greenland as he backs off tariffs threat
content: At Davos, the US president said he would not use force to take the island and later floated a possible "forever" deal.

originalTitle: Trump's jibes are wearing thin for many of Europe's leaders
title: Trump's jibes are wearing thin for many of Europe's leaders
content: The ball is in the court of European leaders ahead of Thursday's emergency EU meeting in Brussels, writes Nick Beake.

title: EU suspends approval of US trade deal
content: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

originalTitle: Slot praises Salah return on important night for both
title: Slot praises Salah return on important night for both
content: Arne Slot praises the return of Mohamed Salah, with Liverpool's Champions League win in Marseille proving important for both.

originalTitle: 'He came here for these nights' - Wissa inspires Newcastle
title: 'He came here for these nights' - Wissa inspires Newcastle
content: Eddie Howe says Yoane Wissa came to Newcastle "for these nights" after his first Champions League goal at St James' Park.

originalTitle: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
title: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
content: Morgan Rogers says he "can be anything" - while the Aston Villa star is talking about his positional flexibility, rather than boasting about his quality, his confidence is well-placed.
